title: Bluesky Firehose: Anonymized Posts (Dec 2025)
subtitle: 101,040 Bluesky posts (Dec 2-25, 2025), SHA-256 anonymized, with VADER sentiment and language detection
description:
## Dataset Overview

[Live Collection View](https://dr.eamer.dev/bluesky/firehose/)

- Collection Period: December 2-25, 2025
- Source: Bluesky social media posts via the AT Protocol firehose
- Anonymization: All author identifiers anonymized using SHA-256 hashing

## Data Included

- Post Text
- Sentiment Scores: VADER
- Detected Languages: 90 languages
- Thread Structure: Reply chains preserved via hashes
- Media Flags
- Embed Types
- Hashtags
- Mentions
- External Links

## Data Excluded

- Engagement Metrics: Likes, reposts, reply counts (stored separately in user repositories)

### Use Cases

- Sentiment Analysis
- Multilingual NLP
- Temporal Patterns
- Content Analysis
- Language Modeling
- Thread Structure Analysis

### Author Demographics

- Unique Authors: 43,998
- Language Distribution:
  - 60% English
  - 12% Japanese
  - 11% Unknown
  - 4% en-US
  - 2% Korean
